overview: President of DDK Technology Group, Tim Donahoe has 18 years of experience in the IT Industry. He has extensive experience in Oracle Database Administration, application development and integration. With a deep understanding in database management architectures, production operations, and applications that use very large volumes of data, he has managed large-scale integration projects for DOD, health care financial, and cable/media industries. He has worked as an independent consultant, lead Database Administrator and project manager for DDK clients Hughes Network Systems, Discovery Communications, Inc. , Porter Instrument Company and the United States Navy. Tim graduated with a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science from the University of Maryland.
